incidents.name: Account Upgrade Attempts Returning Error Messages

incident_updates.body: The issue causing some customers to be unable to upgrade their accounts has been resolved.

The issue causing some customers to be unable to upgrade their accounts has been mitigated. Customers should now be able to upgrade their accounts without issue. We are continuing to carefully monitor recovery to ensure recovery is sustained. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some customers are currently experiencing error messages when attempting to upgrade their accounts in Console. Affected users may see error messages alerting them to wait up to 60 seconds before retrying. As a workaround, customers should attempt to upgrade via https://console.twilio.com/account/upgrade. Our team is actively investigating the issue and working to restore normal functionality. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers are currently experiencing error messages when attempting to upgrade their accounts in Console. Affected users may see error messages alerting them to wait up to 60 seconds before retrying. incidents.name: Missing Recommendations Banner in Console

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Insights was degraded for approximately 653 minutes between 04:00 and 14:52 Pacific Time on 01/20/2026. During this period, customers may have experienced missing Recommendations banners in the Console. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are investigating an issue where the Recommendations banner was not visible in Messaging Insights within the Twilio Console. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Data store functionality degraded for <Connect><VirtualAgent> integration with Dialogflow CX agents

incident_updates.body: The issue causing customers leveraging Dialogflow CX data stores for their <Connect><VirtualAgent> integration with Dialogflow CX to experience generic failure responses from the data store has been resolved and all services are now operating normally.

Dialogflow CX data store functionality for <Connect><VirtualAgent> integrations is now operating normally. Mitigation was applied and data store functionality should be functioning as intended. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue with Twilio Verify Webhooks, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Verify Webhooks. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays From Network Subscribers to a Subset of Twilio Phone Numbers in Australia

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing delivery delays from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure full recovery and will provide another update within 2 hours or sooner as more information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing SMS delivery delays from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia. Our engineers are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update within 4 hours or sooner as more information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing SMS delivery delays from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia. Our engineers are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will share another update within 2 hours or sooner as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
